utterances.speaker: SPEAKER_00
utterances.text: お出口は前の左側ドアです。

utterances.speaker: SPEAKER_00
utterances.text: Please exit from the door on the front left of the train.

utterances.speaker: SPEAKER_01
utterances.text: 降りの際は、お足元にご注意ください。

utterances.speaker: SPEAKER_01
utterances.text: Please watch your step when you leave the train.
